DOC.detailed_description: Postoperative urinary retention ( POUR ) common issue follow urogynecologic surgery , incidence rate 1.4-43 % . The wide range incidence due lack standardized definition POUR . Generally speaking , POUR characterize impairment bladder empty follow surgery . Given low incidence POUR one-week postoperative patient dissatisfaction urinary catheter management , home self-removal indwell urinary catheter important topic investigation . We try compare incidence POUR self-discontinuation office-discontinuation urinary catheter .
